item.title: Defining the architecture
item.description: In this post I will introduce you the architecture of Sento. The project consists of the following components: Crawler This piece of software communicates with Twitter’s and OpenStreeMap Nominatim’s APIs and does the following tasks: Extracts the text content in tweets beloging to the current available trends. Extracts metadata information from the trends themselves*, such as: How did the trend rank during its lifetime in a certain location.
